mapper.select: WITH lastPid AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(pid) > 0 THEN MAX(pid) ELSE '00000000000_0' END AS max_pid FROM pay WHERE cardco=#{cardco} AND chargedate=${chargedate} ) SELECT SUBSTR(#{cardco}, 1, 1) || SUBSTR(#{chargedate}, 1, 4) || SUBSTR(#{chargedate}, 6, 2) || SUBSTR(#{chargedate}, 9, 2) || '_' || TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(max_pid, 13)) + 1) AS pid FROM lastPid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay (pid, chargedate, expiredate, cardno, cvcno, price, cardco, cancel) VALUES (#{pid}, TO_DATE(#{chargedate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')), TO_DATE(#{expiredate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')), #{cardno}, #{cvcno}, #{price}, #{cardno}, #{cancel})
mapper.update: UPDATE pay SET cancel='Y' WHERE pid=#{pid}
